episodes.title: The Cult of The Real Housewife - MARY COSBY - Faith Temple Pentecostal Church
episodes.description:
In this shocking new documentary regarding Mary Cosby and her husband Robert Cosby Sr ex members come forward to speak out about their thought on Mary Cosby and the way she runs this church many of them are claiming that this is potentially a cult. And this documentary we get to 
Care what some of the members have to say about this church.  Several members come forward to speak out about their thought on Mary Cosby and the way she runs this church and many of them are claiming that this is a cult. 

This documentary aired on January 1, 2026 on TLC and is available to stream on HBO Max and Discovery+ the next day.
